ygData.subject: Re: Genni?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know... that gnome is one fast little dude.  :)   In full gear, an extra 81 pounds would slow me down considerably. I can t imagine that a bard
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Bah, it's about 81 pounds. You can run with it just fine.
> With Accelerando and a drum, you'll probably still be faster
> than SoW unencumbered (with a MM drum you definitely will be).

I don't know... that gnome is one fast little dude. :) In full gear, an extra 81 pounds would
slow me down considerably.

I can't imagine that a bard wants to get the boots anyway. The real challenge is for someone
like a necro to catch this little guy while carrying that much. I know that my necro would be
crawling with that much on him.

I'd suggest working as a team. One or more people find the guy, then pin him down with /hail
while you slog over with the cash :)

Jyzan
